item.title: Taking Easy Script Request
item.dc:creator: @aznph8playa aznph8playa
item.description:
@aznph8playa wrote:

nikomo:

could you make an code for this game? http://www.mcsaatchi.webcentral.com.au/tennischallenge/optus_tennis_site_edited.html it would need to click the ball so that it wont reach the bottom… the game doesnt have eny stuff that rs has so u can use every single style to make it work

Just like RSNewb said, it’s pretty simple.

program BallClicker;
var x,y:integer;
begin
activateclient;
repeat
if findcolor(x,y,65433,9,160,440,390) then
 begin
  clickmouse(x,y,true)
  wait(200)
 end
until(false)
end.

Read full topic

@tissuess wrote:

I have a project for you. I was going to learn how to code in scar, but if you want to do this, then cool.
Check out www.neopets.com/games/neoquest/neoquest.phtml, they have a game called Neoquest (the first one). i was wondering if you could make an autoer for that. all it needs to do is take a step to the left 5 times, fight whatever is in its way, and then procedd to do the 5 steps to the left thing, and once 5 left steps are done, move it 5 steps to the right and attack watever is in tis way.
I can code in Visual Basic but i dont understand pascal. let me know if you can do this.
cheers.

item.title: Taking Easy Script Request
item.dc:creator: @aznph8playa aznph8playa
item.description:
@aznph8playa wrote:

[code]
program SimpleClickerByTarantulaeditedbyaznph8playa;

var x,y:integer;
WaitTime=(200); {This is the wait time after each click}

procedure a;
begin
clickmouse(x,y, true);
wait(WaitTime);
end;

begin
repeat
getMousepos(x,y);
a;
until(false)
end.[/code]

This gets your mouse position for you and then clicks, you can move your mouse around and it’ll click after it or you can use the following as the main code to have it click where your mouse is when you start the program.

begin getMousepos(x,y); repeat a; until(false) end.

Read full topic

item.title: Taking Easy Script Request
item.dc:creator: @Tarantula Tarantula
item.description:
@Tarantula wrote:

Done, here you go…

[code]//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// This script is made by Tarantula [www.moparisthebest.com] //
// //
// To run this script… //
// 1. Set Lines 16-18 //
// 2. Run the script with hotkeys [Recommended] //
// //
// START = [CTRL + ALT + R] //
// PAUSE = [CTRL + ALT + A] //
// STOP = [CTRL + ALT + S] //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

program SimpleClickerByTarantula;

const
x=(300); {This is x coordinate}
y=(200); {This is y coordinate}
WaitTime=(200); {This is the wait time after each click}

procedure a;
begin
clickmouse(x,y, true);
wait(WaitTime);
end;

begin
repeat
a;
until(false)
end.[/code]

Still taking requests

~Tarantula
